summary: Use this API to upload multiple image files (less than 9 images)
description: Use this API to upload multiple image files (less than 9 images).

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/shop/get_shop_info?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: shop_name
schema.description: Name of the shop.

schema.name: region
schema.description: Shop's area.

schema.name: status
schema.description: Applicable status: BANNED, FROZEN, NORMAL.

schema.name: sip_affi_shops
schema.description: SIP affiliate shops info list.If you request for SIP primary shop,this field will be returned, if you request for SIP affiliate shop,this field won't be returned

schema.name: affi_shop_id
schema.description: Affiliate shop's id.

schema.name: region
schema.description: Affiliate Shop's area.

schema.name: is_cb
schema.description: Use this filed to indicate whether the shop is a cross-border shop.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: auth_time
schema.description: The timestamp when the shop was authorized to the partner.

schema.name: expire_time
schema.description: Use this field to indicate the expiration date for shop authorization.

schema.name: is_sip
schema.description: This filed will return "true" when SIP primary shop or affiliate shop calls

schema.name: is_upgraded_cbsc
schema.description: Use this filed to indicate whether this merchant is upgraded to CBSC, including CNSC and KRSC.

schema.name: merchant_id
schema.description: Shopee’s unique identifier for a merchant. If the shop won't under any merchant, then the value will be null.

schema.name: shop_fulfillment_flag
schema.description: Use this field to indicate the fulfillment type of current shop, the applicable values: - Pure - FBS Shop: Single mode, refer to Local/CB shops which only have Shopee official warehouse stock, orders are fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse; - Pure - 3PF Shop: Single mode, refer to CB shops which only have local seller warehouse stock, orders are fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels; - PFF - FBS Shop: 1) Hybird mode, refer to Local shops which have both Shopee official warehouse stock and local seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse and can also fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels; 2) Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have both Shopee official warehouse stock and CB seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse and can also fulfilled by seller from CB seller warehouse via CB logistics channels; - PFF - 3PF Shop: Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have both local seller warehouse stock and CB seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels and can also fulfilled by seller from CB seller warehouse via CB logistics channels; - LFF Hybrid Shop: Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have 3 types of stock: FBS stock (Shopee official warehouse stock), 3PF stock (CB seller own stock in the local market) and CB SLS stock (CB seller own stock in CN/HK/KR); - Others - Unknown: Returned when obtaining shop_fulfillment_flag information fails

schema.name: is_main_shop
schema.description: Identifies if the current shop is a Local Shop linked to Cross Border Direct Shop.

schema.name: is_direct_shop
schema.description: Identifies if the current shop is a Cross Border Direct Shop.

schema.name: linked_main_shop_id
schema.description: Returns the Shop ID of the Local Shop linked to the Cross Border Direct Shop.

schema.name: linked_direct_shop_list
schema.description: Returns the list of Cross Border Direct Shops linked to the Local Shop.

schema.name: direct_shop_id
schema.description: Shop ID of the Cross Border Direct Shop.

schema.name: direct_shop_region
schema.description: Shop Region of the Cross Border Direct Shop.

schema.name: is_one_awb
schema.description: Use this filed to indicate if the shop is in 1-AWB whitelist. If is_one_awb return true, please use new AWB size (10cm x 15cm thermal paper) to print AWB. For more details, please refer to: https://open.shopee.com/announcements/1138?category=3&is_top=false

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
The shop id you provided is not found. Please check your shop id.
